title: 1 Bd on Fellsway, HT/HW, newer appl., separate Kitchen
posting_body: PROPERTY INFO
Rent: $1,650 / Month
Beds: 1
Bath: 1
Available Date: 09/01/2022
Pet: Cats Allowed
Rent Includes:: Heat, Hot Water
Parking:: off-street parking
One bedroom on the Fellsway in Medford.
12 unit, brick building on Fellsway,  Off-street parking, laundry in the building.
On Bus-line in front of building; 5 minutes to Orange Line.
Easy access to I-93 N/S, Rt. 16 E/W and Rt. 28.
N/S
For apartment value, this is a great choice.
For much less than the cost of living in one of the new apartment buildings, you can live in a clean, well maintained, professionally managed apartment building owned by Mastrocola Management.
Upon vacancy, each apartment is given a complete “top to bottom inspection” to be sure everything is just the way you’d expect it to be.
The location of this property is as good as any property in Medford.
Set back from the Fellsway (Route 28) you’ll live just outside Wellington Circle.
The MBTA has bus routes 100, 101, 108 and 134 just outside your door.
You’ll be short bus ride to the Orange Line’s Wellington Station or Malden Center.
For your car, you’ll have an assigned off street parking space.
This property offers a superior location for commuting, and for entertainment and relaxation at multiple nearby centers including Station Landing and Assembly Row.
So, save money and avoid the high cost of a brand new apartment.
Rent one of our older well maintained apartments for a fraction of the cost.
And have heat and hot water included!
This property is professionally managed by Mastrocola Management, known for providing clean, well maintained properties and prompt dependable service.
If you become one of our tenants, you will be respected as a valued customer.
Good credit and references a must to qualify.
For more details and property video, please visit our web-site at <URL>.
